scripts.dev: cross-env NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_OPTIONS="--no-warnings" CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=1 NEXT_DISABLE_SYMLINKS=true NEXT_FORCE_DISK_CACHE=true NEXT_EXPERIMENTAL_SYMBOLIC_LINK_PROTECTION=false next dev
scripts.reliable-dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_OPTIONS="--no-warnings --max-old-space-size=4096" CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=1 NEXT_DISABLE_SYMLINKS=true NEXT_FORCE_DISK_CACHE=true WATCHPACK_POLLING=true NEXT_EXPERIMENTAL_SYMBOLIC_LINK_PROTECTION=false next dev
scripts.onedrive-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_OPTIONS="--no-warnings --max-old-space-size=4096" CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=1 NEXT_DISABLE_SYMLINKS=true NEXT_FORCE_DISK_CACHE=true WATCHPACK_POLLING=true NEXT_EXPERIMENTAL_SYMBOLIC_LINK_PROTECTION=false next dev
scripts.dev:win: chcp 65001 && cross-env NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_ENV=development next dev
scripts.windows-dev: cross-env NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_OPTIONS="--no-warnings" NEXT_DISABLE_SYMLINKS=true next dev
scripts.no-links-dev: cross-env NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_OPTIONS="--no-warnings" CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=1 NEXT_DISABLE_SYMLINKS=true NEXT_FORCE_DISK_CACHE=true NEXT_EXPERIMENTAL_SYMBOLIC_LINK_PROTECTION=false next dev
